name: Use AWS KMS Customer Managed Key (CMK) for AppFlow Connector Profile Encryption
description: Ensure that AppFlow connector profiles are encrypted using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMKs) for enhanced security and control over encryption keys.

name: Use AWS KMS Customer Managed Key (CMK) for AppFlow Flow Encryption
description: Ensure that AppFlow flows are encrypted using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMKs) to protect sensitive data during processing and transfer.

name: Enable Encryption in Transit for AppFlow Flows
description: Ensure that all AppFlow flows use encryption in transit with the latest TLS protocols to protect data as it moves between source and destination.

name: Implement Least Privilege Access for AppFlow Flows
description: Ensure that IAM policies for AppFlow flows follow the principle of least privilege, granting only the necessary permissions to authorized entities for accessing source and destination resources.

name: Enable AppFlow Flow Logging
description: Enable logging for AppFlow flows to capture detailed information about flow executions, including start time, end time, status, and any errors encountered during the process.

name: Configure AppFlow Flow Failure Handling
description: Implement appropriate error handling and notification mechanisms for AppFlow flows to ensure timely response to failures and data transfer issues.

name: Implement Data Validation for AppFlow Flows
description: Configure data validation rules within AppFlow flows to ensure the integrity and quality of data being transferred between source and destination.

name: Use Private Connectivity for AppFlow Flows
description: Utilize AWS PrivateLink or VPC endpoints for AppFlow to establish private connectivity between VPCs and AppFlow, reducing exposure to the public internet.

name: Implement Regular Review of AppFlow Flow Configurations
description: Establish a process for regular review and audit of AppFlow flow configurations to ensure they remain aligned with security best practices and business requirements.

name: Enable AppFlow Tags for Resource Management
description: Implement a consistent tagging strategy for AppFlow resources to enhance resource management, cost allocation, and security tracking.
